featured.text: The structure, to be erected in the redeveloped areas of the capital’s 13th district, will cost 250 million francs (US$42 million).

definition.zh_def: 重新開發，特別是指對土地或建築物進行改造或更新以提高其價值或用途。
definition.en_def: To develop something again or in a different way, especially to improve or modernize it.
definition.example: The city plans to redevelop the old industrial area into a vibrant community space.
